Text: Sandler O'Neill lowered shares of Customers Bancorp from a buy rating to a hold rating in a research report on Thursday, July 25th. One research analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating, two have issued a hold rating and three have assigned a buy rating to the stock. The stock currently has a consensus rating of Hold and a consensus target price of $27.95.
